Title: The Other Side
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Angela Kang
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone, with plans of taking more than supplies.
